Package space.sunqian.common.io

Interface IOOperator

All Superinterfaces:
ByteIOOperator, CharIOOperator
@ThreadSafe public interface IOOperator extends ByteIOOperator, CharIOOperator
This interface provides I/O operations.

    static IOOperator

  • Method Details

    • defaultOperator

      static IOOperator defaultOperator()
      Returns the default IOOperator instance of which buffer size of IOKit.bufferSize().
      Returns:
      the default IOOperator instance of which buffer size of IOKit.bufferSize()

    • get

      static IOOperator get(int bufSize) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns a IOOperator instance with the given buffer size. If the buffer size equals to the IOKit.bufferSize(), returns the default IOOperator instance, otherwise returns a new one by newOperator(int).
      Parameters:
      bufSize - the given buffer size, must > 0
      Returns:
      a IOOperator instance with the given buffer size
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given buffer size <= 0

    • newOperator

      static IOOperator newOperator(int bufSize) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns a new IOOperator instance with the given buffer size.
      Parameters:
      bufSize - the given buffer size, must > 0
      Returns:
      a new IOOperator instance with the given buffer size
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given buffer size <= 0
